content:
Hi All,
any FHIRcast public server available for testing connectathon use cases? Please advise.

You can try:
end-point description
http://212.187.34.124:4401/ FHIRcast test application
http://212.187.34.124:9450/api/fhir/ FHIRcast linked FHIR server
http://212.187.34.124:9450/api/fhir/metadata CapabilityStatement with FHIRcast extension
http://212.187.34.124:9450/api/fhir/.wellknown/fhircast-configuration FHIRcast wellknown configuration
http://212.187.34.124:9450/api/sync/fhircast/ FHIRcast hub url.
http://212.187.34.124:9450/api/sync/fhircast/Topic1/Patient Rest endpoint for topic Topic1 and anchor type Patient.

Predefined topics:
Topic1, Topic2, Topic3, Topic4, Topic5, Topic6, Topic7, Topic8, Topic9
Thank you @Bas van den Heuvel ... let me test this..
Server should be up again - without the issue.
